mapper.select: SELECT orgSEQ FROM eosorg_t_organization where orgID = #{orgId} and status = 1

select t.tenantId from Tenant t,eosorg_t_organization eo where eo.status = 1 and t.orgId = eo.orgId
and eo.orgSEQ like CONCAT('%.',#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},'.%')
SELECT , from eosorg_t_organization,tenant where eosorg_t_organization.orgId=tenant.orgId and tenant.tenantId=#{tenantId}

select , from eosorg_t_organization where status = 1
and orgID in
#{item}
order by CONVERT(orgName USING 'gbk')
